item.title: Microsoft’s Windows XP Crocs are no joke
item.description: Microsoft isn’t done celebrating its 50th anniversary just yet. Multiple employees tell me that Microsoft has created limited edition Windows XP-themed Crocs. They even come with a Clippy shoe charm i
